lead_paragraph: DRESNER--Milton. High Ridge Country Club acknowledges with sorrow the passing of our esteemed member, Milton Dresner. We extend our deepest sympathy to his beloved family. Robert D. Lang, President Harvey Karofsky, Secretary 1/3
